articles.description: Apple Pay could finally be available to use on third-party browsers, like Chrome, Edge, and Firefox in the iOS 16 beta.  This mean you may no longer have to use Safari when you want to pay with Apple Pay.
articles.content:
Not just Safari
Photo by Victoria Song / The Verge
Apple Pay could finally be compatible with Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, and Mozilla Firefox in iOS 16. MacRumors contributor Steve Moser found t… [+2181 chars]
